prompt: I want to design a simple 2D platformer game. The player is a cat that can run and jump, collects fish, and avoids dogs. It's a Unity mobile game with 5 levels. Help me create the game design and implementation plan documents.
assertions: A docs_for_ai/ directory is created with proper subdirectories (game_design/ and implementation/)
All documents are written in English
Variable values are marked with [EXAMPLE: value] notation
The documents include a File Manifest section listing all detail files
At least one game design detail file is created in docs_for_ai/game_design/
At least one implementation detail file is created in docs_for_ai/implementation/
